title: Steve McManaman
summary: Steven McManaman (born 11 February 1972) is an English former footballer who played as a winger for Liverpool, Real Madrid and Manchester City.[3][4] McManaman is the most decorated English footballer to have played for a club abroad and is regarded as one of the best players of his generation, with the UEFA website stating in 2012 that "of all England's footballing exports in the modern era, none was as successful as McManaman".[5][6] He is currently a co-commentator on ESPN and BT Sport's football coverage and a La Liga ambassador.
